title: Initial OB Visit (6-10 Weeks)
description: Review of medical history, medications, and labs (CBC, blood type, etc.). Ultrasound may be ordered. Diet and exercise discussion.

title: Genetic Testing & Review (10-18 Weeks)
description: Offer genetic testing. Review labs and ultrasounds.

title: Routine Checkup (16 Weeks)
description: Routine prenatal visit (part of 4-week schedule). Review weight and BP.

title: Anatomy Scan (19-20 Weeks)
description: Ultrasound for fetal anatomy and organ development.

title: Routine Checkup (24 Weeks)
description: Routine prenatal visit. Discuss preterm labor signs.

title: Glucose Screening (24-28 Weeks)
description: Gestational Diabetes screen (50g glucose drink). CBC blood draw. Tdap vaccine offered if >27 weeks.

title: Routine Checkup & RhoGAM (28 Weeks)
description: Routine checkup. RhoGAM injection if Rh negative. Discuss birth plan and hospital registration.

title: Education & Planning (32-34 Weeks)
description: Labor instructions, choosing a pediatrician, breast pump referral.

title: GBS Test (36-37 Weeks)
description: Group Beta Strep (GBS) Test. Finalize birth plan and hospital consent.

title: Due Date Checkup (40 Weeks)
description: Routine weekly visit. Discuss postdates care.

title: Overdue Check (41+ Weeks)
description: Evaluate fetal wellbeing (NST, BPP, Ultrasound). Counsel on induction of labor.
